analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol:
	Contract TokenFactory has payable functions:
	 - Authorization (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#73-79)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in TokenFactory.createToken (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#394-426):
	External calls:
	- XPAAssetToken(assetTokens[i]).getSymbol() == keccak256()(symbol_) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#403-407)
	- XPAAssetToken(newAsset).assignOperator(XPAAssets) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#412-414)
	- XPAAssetToken(newAsset).assignOperator(ETHAssets) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#414-417)
	- XPAAssetToken(newAsset).assignBurner(fundAccounts[j]) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#422-424)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- assetTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#425-426)

Reentrancy in TokenFactory.setETHAssets (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#518-560):
	External calls:
	- dismissTokenOperator(ETHAssets) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#553-554)
	- assignTokenOperator(candidateETHAssets) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#554-555)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ETHAssets (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#556-557)
	- candidateETHAssets (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#557-560)

Reentrancy in TokenFactory.setXPAAssets (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#473-518):
	External calls:
	- dismissTokenOperator(XPAAssets) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#512)
	- assignTokenOperator(candidateXPAAssets) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#513)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- XPAAssets (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#514-515)
	- candidateXPAAssets (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#516)
newAsset in TokenFactory.createToken (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#402) is a local variable never initialiazed

TokenFactory.createToken has external calls inside a loop:
	- XPAAssetToken(newAsset).assignBurner(fundAccounts[j]) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#422-424)

TokenFactory.createToken has external calls inside a loop:
	- XPAAssetToken(assetTokens[i]).getSymbol() == keccak256()(symbol_) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#403-407)

TokenFactory.addFundAccount has external calls inside a loop:
	- XPAAssetToken(assetTokens[i]).assignBurner(account_) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#572-574)

TokenFactory.removeFundAccount has external calls inside a loop:
	- XPAAssetToken(assetTokens[i]).dismissBunner(account_) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#595-598)

TokenFactory.assignTokenOperator has external calls inside a loop:
	- XPAAssetToken(assetTokens[i]).assignOperator(user_) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol)

TokenFactory.dismissTokenOperator has external calls inside a loop:
	- XPAAssetToken(assetTokens[i]).dismissOperator(user_) (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol)

TokenFactory.setExchange (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#429-473) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- exchange_ == candidateExchange && candidateTillExchange < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#460-473)
	- exchange_ != candidateExchange && candidateTillExchange + 86400 * 7 < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#447-473)

TokenFactory.setXPAAssets (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#473-518) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- XPAAssets_ != candidateXPAAssets && candidateTillXPAAssets + 86400 * 7 < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#490-517)
	- XPAAssets_ == candidateXPAAssets && candidateTillXPAAssets < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#502-517)

TokenFactory.setETHAssets (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#518-560) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- ETHAssets_ == candidateETHAssets && candidateTillETHAssets < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#547-560)
	- ETHAssets_ != candidateETHAssets && candidateTillETHAssets + 86400 * 7 < block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#533-560)

TokenFactory.ETH should be constant (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#394)
TokenFactory.XPA should be constant (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#393-394)
TokenFactory.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/38/0x36b86289ccce0984251ccca62871b589b0f52d68.sol#363)
